resources.string: In a addition to be a student in Dorset college, I have also been doing courses at Udemy and CodeWithMosh in order to learn more and more, and after two years studying science in computing, I have learnt how to create websites coding with HTML,CSS, and JavaScript, I have also learnt how to create programs with C#,and Java, how to create databases with MySQL, and How to use GIT,GitHub, and Linux CLI.
Hey there, my name is Breno Silva Brito, I am a computer science student at Dorset College, I am 24 years old brazillian man seeking for challenges and more knowlodge...
